Interface IBSearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinarySearchTree

    public interface IBSearchTree<E extends java.lang.Comparable<E>>
    The Binary Search Tree interface which specifies the functionality of the Binary Search Tree and its attributes

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createBalancedTree

        void createBalancedTree(java.util.ArrayList<E> dataList,
                        int leftCurrentRange,
                        int rightCurrentRange)
        Creates a balanced Binary Search Tree from a sorted array of data
        Parameters:
        dataList - the sorted datalist
        leftCurrentRange - the range for the left side of the BST
        rightCurrentRange - the range for the ride side of the BST

      • addNode

        void addNode(E theItem)
        Adds a new Node to the BST
        Parameters:
        theItem - the new Node that is being added to the BST

      • nodeContains

        boolean nodeContains(E desiredItem)
        Searches if a node with certain module mark value already exists in the tree
        Parameters:
        desiredItem - the node that's module mark value is being search for
        Returns:
        true if the module mark is found, false otherwise

      • findItem

        E findItem(E desiredItem)
        Helper method for the nodeContains function
        Parameters:
        desiredItem - the node that's module mark value is being search for
        Returns:
        true if the module mark is found, false otherwise

      • deleteNode

        E deleteNode(E desiredItem)
        Helper method for the removeNode function
        Parameters:
        desiredItem - the Node that is being deleted to the BST
        Returns:
        the deleted Node

      • removeNode

        boolean removeNode(E desiredItem)
        Deletes a Node to the BST
        Parameters:
        desiredItem - the Node that is being deleted to the BST
        Returns:
        true if the node has been removed, false otherwise
